Reason: The 'enablePngCrush' configuration option is performance-sensitive. This is because when the option is enabled, it triggers the addition of a PngCrushProcessor post processor to the list of post processors during file conversion. The PngCrushProcessor performs PNG optimization using the pngcrush tool, which can have a notable impact on performance and output quality at the system level. Additionally, the code related to checking and adding the PngCrushProcessor involves time-expensive and memory-expensive operations, contributing to significant performance variations.
